TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Italy, title = Italy, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy} }

S.FORM: u Italy sa i labu nu Europe, itiza i 42 50 N, 12 50 E u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 301,340 km2 u ahebal nu lalaay sa izaw ku 294,140 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 7,200 km2 hamin nu tademawan sa 62,007,540. kakalukan umah sa 47.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 31.40%, zumaay henay umah sa 21.50% caay kai liwliw nu Taywan. :Repubblica Italiana,通稱義大利(Italia), IT. Italy masakaputay kapulungan a kanatal "Italy a kamu, Repubblica Italiana, ngangan Italy "Italia", nu Europe misakakuay a kanatal, angangan uyni i nutimulan a Ou-cu masakucuay a Ya-pin-nin pankiw subal "Italy pangkiw subal" atu tusaay a Mediterranean subal Si-si-li a subal atu Sa-tin-ni-ya a subal a nisakaput, kitakit a mangngu IT. Italy nuwamisan Alps a buyu' a kakitizaan nu France , Switzerland , Austria atu Slovenia matatiles ku lala', nu zumaan a lala' mitaliyuk tu tusaay a kasaadidi'ay a kanatal San Marino atu Vatican , i Switzerland izaw ku tizaay i Lu-cya-nuw a taku tapiingan nu taku u Italy Kan-pou-ney kuynian i likutay a lala'. tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Rome . kakininan nu kanatal demiad kakining nu kanatal demiad sa 2 bulad 6 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Sergio Mattarella (Sayelciyaw．Matalyela 塞爾焦·馬塔雷拉), 1941 a mihca 7 a bulad 23 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Italy ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihca 2 bulad 3 demiad. laylay Italy a laylay, anu makay lalangawan atu syakay u nipalahadan piazih i Ti-cung-Hay amin a kakitizaan macalap ku kahenulan a singangan. maka Italy labu nu kanatal katuud ku mikawaway micekiway tu kasumamadan a tuud i kawaw a matineng tu tiniay a kakitizaan a laylay taneng taayaw mikilim katukuh pakalal tu 2000,000 a mihcaan ayaw nu malumanay nu ba'tuay a ziday. Italy mutesek kibetu ku tineng tu lalangawan, Italy a kanatal yadah ku kakitizaan u kahenulan micekiw tu kasumamadan nisubelidan a tuud, mahiniay u La-tin-mu , Tu-s-ka-na , Un-pu-li-ya atu Pa-si-li-ka-ta a kakitizaan. Greece a tademaw i ayaw nu waluay katukuh pituay tu kasumamadan a mihcaan hawsa na i Sicily a subal atu Italy pankiw a subal nutimulan a kakitizaan mikawaw tu micumuday a tademaw, sisa uynian kasumamadan Greece a tademaw i Italy pangkiw a suba nutmulan patizeng tu mucumuday a tuse sakaput pangangan han tu tabakiay a Greece . kasumamadan a Roma i ayaw waluay kasumamadan a mihcaan u adidi'ay malukay nu syahuy haymaw sa malahad masataliyuk tu ku Ti-cung-hay u satabakiay hungti a kanatal. hekal a lala' Italy hekal a lala' u angangan namay Ou-cu-talu mulalad micumud tu Ti-cung-hay masaamingucuay a Ya-pin-nin pangkiw a subal, atu tusaay angangan a subal-Sa-tin a subal atu Si-si-li-taw a nisakaput "palasic i Mediterranean u saayaway atu sakatusa a subal" uyni tuluay a kalasic i Italy a liwliw nu nanum malalasic, nuwalian nuwamisan a Ya-te-li-ya a bayu, nuwalian nutimulanu I-aw-ni-ya a bayu , satipan nutimulan u Ti-le-ni-an a bayu , satipan nuwamisan u Li-ku-li-ya a bayu . cen-ce . Italy ayzaay a hulic i 1947 a mihcaan sabaw tusa a bulad tusa a bataay izaw ku tusa a demiad patizengan tu hulic malaku't tu nikayngian. hulic nilekecan Italy u cacay patizangay i misakakawaway u angangan u binawlanay masakaputay kapulungan a kanatal. Italy a tatengilan tu kawaw u satalakaway patizengay tu hulic atu miazihay mikuwanay a sakaput, auuyzan tusa huing a lekec tatengilal tu kawaw nu kanatal, u masakaputay kapulungan a kanatal u tusaay a pahulican a giing a nisakaput. tusaay a pahuingang malecad situngu tu sakuwan, taneng misakaku makaawas tu nipaketunan tu kawawa, nika tusaay a huing paketun tu kawaw masalitin tu. sakikalisiw . duduc tu kitakit u salaliyun tu kalisiw tu GDP a nisulitan, Italy i 2008 a mihcaan i kitakit u saka pitu nu tabakiay a sakikalisiwan, kina cacay dada' i Amilika, China, Japan, Germany, United Kingdom atu France. Italy nu Europe sepatay tabakiay a sakikalisiwan tu cacay, uyzaan aca nusiwaay a kanatal saupu a sakaput atu Europe makakadumay sakaput a tademaw. i sakatusa a ngangayaw nu kitakit mapahezek hawsa, Italy angangan makay malukay a kawaw malawacu' ku sakikalisiw, satu mala u talakaway tu nu kikayay a kusi nu kanatal atu kitakit paliwalay nipatahkalay tu tuud a kalisiw i kitakit u saayaway singanganay a kanatal. caay ka hini dada', Italy a sakikalisiw atu United Kingdom kayadah ku nikacunus tu sakakikalisiw. tademaw Italy a tademaw i 2008 a mihcaan mahezek hawsa malakui' tu 6,000 a mang ku tademaw, i mahini i Europe a malasacabayay (Europe Union 歐盟) kasiluc nu ngangan sakasepat, uyza aca i kitakitay a tademaw saka 23 a nu katuud a kanatal. Italy kazeke nu tademaw paypinbang kungli 199.2 ku tademaw, u sakalima nu Europe a malasacabayay (Europe Union 歐盟). Italy nuwamisan u satalakaway mazeketay, u ahebal macalap hamin nu kanatal tu 2/3, u tademaw hamin i kanatal 50%. sakatusa a ngangayaw nu kitakit hawsa, Italy zayhan matenes malawacu ku sakikalisiw, sisa niyazu'ay a tademaw katuud ku mabulaw tayza i tuse. namahini hawsa, katuud ku nu zumaay a kanatalmabulaway a tademaw katuud satu ku mabulaway muenengay tayza i Italy. satalakaw ku nilecuh tulin katuku i 1970 a mihcaan amasatezep, namahini haymaw satu maselep, sisa katukuh i 2008 a mihcaan, izaw ku lima tu cacay i Italy a tademaw macaliway ku 65 a mihcaan ku nikauzip. singku Italy a cen-bu caay pisatatenga' u Roma a tingsikiw panutekan u kiwkay nu kanatal, Roma a tingsikiw nu Italy saayaway u tabakiay a singcu. pakala tu 87.8% nu Italy a tademaw u singku sa u tingsukiw, iteban izaw tu ku 1/3 ku tademaw "36.8%" u mililulay sinziya. duduc tu Eurobarometer i 2005 a mihcaan malingatu patahkal tu nikisnaan. lalangawan Italy katukuh i 1861 a mihcaan mapapulung zikuzan kya mala u cacayay tu a kanatal, satu i laylay naizaw tu i Italy a kumay a cence, kasumamadan a lalangawan tu tineng nalimaan dadiw a kawaw mahamin mapanukas tungusay tu nu Italy. kanahatu uynian a kakitizaan cence atu syakay likec misateked a mikawaw, Italy i laylay atu lalangawan kasumamadan nisubelidan a zaysang mahiza tu kasatabaki yadah. Italy imahini izaw ku 53 a kakitizaan kitakit kasumamadan nisubelidan a zaysang, i kitakit aca u sayadahay kasumamadan nisubelidan a zaysang a kanatal i kitakit. Italy mahamin i kanatal pulung nisulitan izaw ku 1000,000 ku mahicahicaay a wayway nu sakiningan a tuud " pisupedad piazihan tu tuud,pienengan nu huti a luma', nisangaan tu luma', mituktukay misengiay tu tademaw, kiwkay, nalimaan mikulitan tu salining, u tabakiay salunganay a luma', mabuwahay a nemnem, laylay misangaan tu luma' atu micekiway tu kasumamada nazipaan. caculilan Ferrovie dello Stato 581艘. Italy a kanatal silamalay a zazan wanglu nu Ferrovie dello Stato a nikuwanan, 2003 a mihcaan pulung a katanaya' 16,287 kungli, uyza 69% nu dingkiay silamalay a zazan, u silamalay a tangah izaw ku 4.937 a tangah. kanatalay nanumay a zazan wanglu "pasu miculu'ay i sauwac atu saculil nu sauwac" i 2002 a mihcaan hawsa izaw ku 1,477 kungli katanaya' i 2004 a mihcaan, Italy angangan a pahikukian pakala tu 30 a pahikukian, "pasu Milano (Mi-lan 米蘭) a Mi-lan-Ma-al-pung-sa a pahikukian atu Roma a Roma-Fiumicino a pahikukian uyni tusaay Ci-niw a pahikukian" atu 43 a pahikukian u angangan a minatu, pasu Genoa bayuay a minatu " Italy u satabakiay a minatu ciniza, nu Ti-cung hay aca u saka tusa tabakiay a minatu, kina cacay dada' i France pidademecan tu subayu". i 2005 a mihcaan, Italy nu binawlanay a balunga izaw ku 389,000 a malungaan, nu misiwbayay a balunga' izaw ku 581 a balungaan.

o Italy sa i labo no Eorope, itiza i 42 50 N, 12 50 E o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa izaw ko 301,340 km2 o ahebal no lalaay sa izaw ko 294,140 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa izaw ko 7,200 km2 hamin no tademawan sa 62,007,540. kakalokan omah sa 47.10%, kilakilangan omah sa 31.40%, zomaay henay omah sa 21.50% caay kai liwliw no Taywan. :Repobblica Italiana,通稱義大利(Italia), IT. Italy masakapotay kapolongan a kanatal "Italy a kamo, Repobblica Italiana, ngangan Italy "Italia", no Eorope misakakoay a kanatal, angangan oyni i notimolan a Oo-co masakocoay a Ya-pin-nin pankiw sobal "Italy pangkiw sobal" ato tosaay a Mediterranean sobal Si-si-li a sobal ato Sa-tin-ni-ya a sobal a nisakapot, kitakit a mangngo IT. Italy nowamisan Alps a boyo' a kakitizaan no France , Switzerland , Aostria ato Slovenia matatiles ko lala', no zomaan a lala' mitaliyok to tosaay a kasaadidi'ay a kanatal San Marino ato Vatican , i Switzerland izaw ko tizaay i Lo-cya-now a tako tapiingan no tako o Italy Kan-poo-ney koynian i likotay a lala'. tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Rome . kakininan no kanatal demiad kakining no kanatal demiad sa 2 bolad 6 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Sergio Mattarella (Sayelciyaw．Matalyela 塞爾焦·馬塔雷拉), 1941 a mihca 7 a bolad 23 a demiad nalecohan. o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) no Italy ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihca 2 bolad 3 demiad. laylay Italy a laylay, ano makay lalangawan ato syakay o nipalahadan piazih i Ti-cong-Hay amin a kakitizaan macalap ko kahenolan a singangan. maka Italy labo no kanatal katood ko mikawaway micekiway to kasomamadan a tood i kawaw a matineng to tiniay a kakitizaan a laylay taneng taayaw mikilim katokoh pakalal to 2000,000 a mihcaan ayaw no malomanay no ba'toay a ziday. Italy motesek kibeto ko tineng to lalangawan, Italy a kanatal yadah ko kakitizaan o kahenolan micekiw to kasomamadan nisobelidan a tood, mahiniay o La-tin-mo , To-s-ka-na , Un-po-li-ya ato Pa-si-li-ka-ta a kakitizaan. Greece a tademaw i ayaw no waloay katokoh pitoay to kasomamadan a mihcaan hawsa na i Sicily a sobal ato Italy pankiw a sobal notimolan a kakitizaan mikawaw to micomoday a tademaw, sisa oynian kasomamadan Greece a tademaw i Italy pangkiw a soba notmolan patizeng to mocomoday a tose sakapot pangangan han to tabakiay a Greece . kasomamadan a Roma i ayaw waloay kasomamadan a mihcaan o adidi'ay malokay no syahoy haymaw sa malahad masataliyok to ko Ti-cong-hay o satabakiay hongti a kanatal. hekal a lala' Italy hekal a lala' o angangan namay Oo-co-talo molalad micomod to Ti-cong-hay masaamingocoay a Ya-pin-nin pangkiw a sobal, ato tosaay angangan a sobal-Sa-tin a sobal ato Si-si-li-taw a nisakapot "palasic i Mediterranean o saayaway ato sakatosa a sobal" oyni toloay a kalasic i Italy a liwliw no nanom malalasic, nowalian nowamisan a Ya-te-li-ya a bayo, nowalian notimolano I-aw-ni-ya a bayo , satipan notimolan o Ti-le-ni-an a bayo , satipan nowamisan o Li-ko-li-ya a bayo . cen-ce . Italy ayzaay a holic i 1947 a mihcaan sabaw tosa a bolad tosa a bataay izaw ko tosa a demiad patizengan to holic malako't to nikayngian. holic nilekecan Italy o cacay patizangay i misakakawaway o angangan o binawlanay masakapotay kapolongan a kanatal. Italy a tatengilan to kawaw o satalakaway patizengay to holic ato miazihay mikowanay a sakapot, aooyzan tosa hoing a lekec tatengilal to kawaw no kanatal, o masakapotay kapolongan a kanatal o tosaay a paholican a giing a nisakapot. tosaay a pahoingang malecad sitongo to sakowan, taneng misakako makaawas to nipaketonan to kawawa, nika tosaay a hoing paketon to kawaw masalitin to. sakikalisiw . dodoc to kitakit o salaliyon to kalisiw to GDP a nisolitan, Italy i 2008 a mihcaan i kitakit o saka pito no tabakiay a sakikalisiwan, kina cacay dada' i Amilika, China, Japan, Germany, United Kingdom ato France. Italy no Eorope sepatay tabakiay a sakikalisiwan to cacay, oyzaan aca nosiwaay a kanatal saopo a sakapot ato Eorope makakadomay sakapot a tademaw. i sakatosa a ngangayaw no kitakit mapahezek hawsa, Italy angangan makay malokay a kawaw malawaco' ko sakikalisiw, sato mala o talakaway to no kikayay a kosi no kanatal ato kitakit paliwalay nipatahkalay to tood a kalisiw i kitakit o saayaway singanganay a kanatal. caay ka hini dada', Italy a sakikalisiw ato United Kingdom kayadah ko nikaconos to sakakikalisiw. tademaw Italy a tademaw i 2008 a mihcaan mahezek hawsa malakoi' to 6,000 a mang ko tademaw, i mahini i Eorope a malasacabayay (Eorope Union 歐盟) kasiloc no ngangan sakasepat, oyza aca i kitakitay a tademaw saka 23 a no katood a kanatal. Italy kazeke no tademaw paypinbang kongli 199.2 ko tademaw, o sakalima no Eorope a malasacabayay (Eorope Union 歐盟). Italy nowamisan o satalakaway mazeketay, o ahebal macalap hamin no kanatal to 2/3, o tademaw hamin i kanatal 50%. sakatosa a ngangayaw no kitakit hawsa, Italy zayhan matenes malawaco ko sakikalisiw, sisa niyazo'ay a tademaw katood ko mabolaw tayza i tose. namahini hawsa, katood ko no zomaay a kanatalmabolaway a tademaw katood sato ko mabolaway moenengay tayza i Italy. satalakaw ko nilecoh tolin katoko i 1970 a mihcaan amasatezep, namahini haymaw sato maselep, sisa katokoh i 2008 a mihcaan, izaw ko lima to cacay i Italy a tademaw macaliway ko 65 a mihcaan ko nikaozip. singko Italy a cen-bo caay pisatatenga' o Roma a tingsikiw panotekan o kiwkay no kanatal, Roma a tingsikiw no Italy saayaway o tabakiay a singco. pakala to 87.8% no Italy a tademaw o singko sa o tingsokiw, iteban izaw to ko 1/3 ko tademaw "36.8%" o mililolay sinziya. dodoc to Eorobarometer i 2005 a mihcaan malingato patahkal to nikisnaan. lalangawan Italy katokoh i 1861 a mihcaan mapapolong zikozan kya mala o cacayay to a kanatal, sato i laylay naizaw to i Italy a komay a cence, kasomamadan a lalangawan to tineng nalimaan dadiw a kawaw mahamin mapanokas tongosay to no Italy. kanahato oynian a kakitizaan cence ato syakay likec misateked a mikawaw, Italy i laylay ato lalangawan kasomamadan nisobelidan a zaysang mahiza to kasatabaki yadah. Italy imahini izaw ko 53 a kakitizaan kitakit kasomamadan nisobelidan a zaysang, i kitakit aca o sayadahay kasomamadan nisobelidan a zaysang a kanatal i kitakit. Italy mahamin i kanatal polong nisolitan izaw ko 1000,000 ko mahicahicaay a wayway no sakiningan a tood " pisopedad piazihan to tood,pienengan no hoti a loma', nisangaan to loma', mitoktokay misengiay to tademaw, kiwkay, nalimaan mikolitan to salining, o tabakiay salonganay a loma', mabowahay a nemnem, laylay misangaan to loma' ato micekiway to kasomamada nazipaan. cacolilan Ferrovie dello Stato 581艘. Italy a kanatal silamalay a zazan wanglo no Ferrovie dello Stato a nikowanan, 2003 a mihcaan polong a katanaya' 16,287 kongli, oyza 69% no dingkiay silamalay a zazan, o silamalay a tangah izaw ko 4.937 a tangah. kanatalay nanomay a zazan wanglo "paso micolo'ay i saowac ato sacolil no saowac" i 2002 a mihcaan hawsa izaw ko 1,477 kongli katanaya' i 2004 a mihcaan, Italy angangan a pahikokian pakala to 30 a pahikokian, "paso Milano (Mi-lan 米蘭) a Mi-lan-Ma-al-pong-sa a pahikokian ato Roma a Roma-Fiomicino a pahikokian oyni tosaay Ci-niw a pahikokian" ato 43 a pahikokian o angangan a minato, paso Genoa bayoay a minato " Italy o satabakiay a minato ciniza, no Ti-cong hay aca o saka tosa tabakiay a minato, kina cacay dada' i France pidademecan to sobayo". i 2005 a mihcaan, Italy no binawlanay a balonga izaw ko 389,000 a malongaan, no misiwbayay a balonga' izaw ko 581 a balongaan.
